info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 1:25PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Berkshire County through 200 PM EDT... At 124 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lenox, or near Pittsfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Lee, Lenox, Becket, Dalton, Hinsdale, Washington, Wheatleigh, Lenox Station, Leisure Lee, Tanglewood, Eastover, New Lenox, Lenox Dale, East Lee, Mahkeenac Shores, The Center At Lenox, Yankee Orchards, Lenox House Country Shops and Mahkeenac Terrace. People attending Tanglewood should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
